head.supplied: Mortons Hotel ¶ 22/10/73 ¶ ¶ I am almost without frank-envelopes, dear Mr. Odgers; will you kindly see that I get some soon, otherwise I have to pay also the postage out of my private purse for stric...

div.p: C73/13654, unit 673, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I am almost without frank-envelopes, dear Mr. Odgers; will you kindly see that I get some soon, otherwise I have to pay also the postage out of my private purse for strictly official letters. My requisition went to your office 2 weeks ago.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
